Thanks for that short synopsis and the links, I found what youy wrote to sp=
ur me to do some further research.
   
  "So much AGAIN for samurai never d=
oing anything dishonorable." As to this statement, the perception a person =
has as to what is honorable or not can change from person to person and eve=
n nation to nation. I can see how a Christian would see it as dishonorable =
yet the people who were expelling/torturing them could see it as a neccessi=
ty to an end. Perception is everything. 
  
tokyo dog <tokyodog@...> wr=
ote:
  I=E2=80=99m no expert in Japan history, but I=E2=80=99ve noticed qui=

lpful if I posted some comments, and some history books for people to read,=
